content.html: And I too was laid off from Twitter today with no notice. I was the lead software engineer responsible for the feature where you're reading a tweet and the screen automatically refreshes and you never see that tweet ever again. Wish me luck.
content.value:
And I too was laid off from Twitter today with no notice. I was the lead software engineer responsible for the feature where you're reading a tweet and the screen automatically refreshes and you never see that tweet ever again.
Wish me luck.
